content:
ScriptObject Class

Definition

Supports all JScript classes. This is the ultimate base class of all JScript classes. This class belongs to the objects and functions category.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public abstract class ScriptObject : System.Reflection.IReflect
Inheritance
Object
ScriptObject
Derived
ActivationObject
JSObject
StackFrame
TypeReflector
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Inherited Members

Equals(Object, Object)

ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Fields

engine

Stores a reference to the scripting engine.

public Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.VsaEngine engine;
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

parent

Stores a reference to the parent object.

protected Microsoft.JScript.ScriptObject parent;
Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

The parent is the object to which the script object delegates requests for properties or methods that it does not implement itself. For example, when you create a NumberObject by using a NumberConstructor, the parent is a NumberPrototype.

Properties

Item(Double)

Gets or sets a member of the script object that is designated by the specified Double index value.

public object this[double index] { get; set; }
Parameters
index
Double

The index of the member.

Value
Object

The value of the member that is at index.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Gets or sets a member of the script object that is designated by the specified Int32 index value.

Item(Object[])

Gets or sets a member of the script object that is designated by the specified name, Double index value, or Int32 index value.

public object this[object[] pars] { get; set; }
Parameters
pars
Object[]

The name or index of the member.

Value
Object

The value of the member that is specified in pars.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

If the pars array has more than one element, the last element is the argument for this property.

Item(String)

Gets or sets a member of the script object that is designated by the specified name.

public object this[string name] { get; set; }

name
String

The name of the member.

Value
Object

The value of the member that is named name.

ComVisibleAttribute

The type of the script object.

Methods

GetField(String, BindingFlags)

Gets a field that has the specified name.

public System.Reflection.FieldInfo GetField (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the field to get.

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
FieldInfo

A field that has the specified name, or null if the script object does not contain the field.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetFields(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of FieldInfo objects that correspond to all fields of the current script object.

public virtual System.Reflection.FieldInfo[] GetFields (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
FieldInfo[]

An array of objects that contains all fields of the current script object.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetMember(String, BindingFlags)

When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members that match a specified name.

public abstract System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMember (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the member to search for.

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
MemberInfo[]

An array of objects that match the name argument.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetMembers(BindingFlags)

When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of MemberInfo objects that correspond to all members of the current script object.

public abstract System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] GetMembers (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
MemberInfo[]

An array of objects that contains all members of the current script object.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetMethod(String, BindingFlags)

Gets a method that has the specified name.

public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the method to get.

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
MethodInfo

A method that has the specified name, or null if the script object does not contain the method.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetMethod(String, BindingFlags, Binder, Type[], ParameterModifier[])

Gets a method that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.

public System.Reflection.MethodInfo GetMethod (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, Type[] types, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the method to search for.

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

binder
Binder

An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

types
Type[]

The parameter types that are used to locate a matching method.

modifiers
ParameterModifier[]

An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.

Returns
MethodInfo

A method that has the specified name, or null if the script object does not contain the method.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetMethods(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of MethodInfo objects that correspond to all methods of the current script object.

public virtual System.Reflection.MethodInfo[] GetMethods (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
MethodInfo[]

An array of objects that contains all methods of the current script object.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetParent()

Gets a reference to the parent object.

public Microsoft.JScript.ScriptObject GetParent ();
Returns
ScriptObject

A reference to the parent object.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

The parent is the object to which the script object delegates requests for properties or methods that it does not implement itself. For example, when you create a NumberObject by using a NumberConstructor, the parent is a NumberPrototype.

GetProperties(BindingFlags)

Gets an array of PropertyInfo objects that correspond to all properties of the current script object.

public virtual System.Reflection.PropertyInfo[] GetProperties (System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
PropertyInfo[]

An array of objects that contains all properties of the current script object.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetProperty(String, BindingFlags, Binder, Type, Type[], ParameterModifier[])

Gets a property that has the specified name by using the specified selection criteria.

public System.Reflection.PropertyInfo GetProperty (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, Type returnType, Type[] types, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the property to search for.

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

binder
Binder

An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

returnType
Type

The type of the return value that the property must have.

types
Type[]

The index types of the property being searched for. Used for index properties, such as the indexer for a class.

modifiers
ParameterModifier[]

An array of parameter modifiers that enable binding to work with parameter signatures in which the types have been modified.

Returns
PropertyInfo

A property that has the specified name, or null if the script object does not contain the property.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

GetProperty(String, BindingFlags)

Gets a property that has the specified name.

public System.Reflection.PropertyInfo GetProperty (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags bindingAttr);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the property to get.

bindingAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

Returns
PropertyInfo

A property that has the specified name, or null if the script object does not contain the property.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

InvokeMember(String, BindingFlags, Binder, Object, Object[], ParameterModifier[], CultureInfo, String[])

Invokes the specified member.

public virtual object InvokeMember (string name, System.Reflection.BindingFlags invokeAttr, System.Reflection.Binder binder, object target, object[] args, System.Reflection.ParameterModifier[] modifiers, System.Globalization.CultureInfo locale, string[] namedParameters);
Parameters
name
String

The name of the member to invoke.

invokeAttr
BindingFlags

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specifies how the search for members is conducted by reflection.

binder
Binder

An object that performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

target
Object

The object on which to invoke the member. This must be the current script object.

args
Object[]

An array of objects that contains the number, order, and type of the parameters of the member to be invoked. This is an empty array if there are no parameters.

modifiers
ParameterModifier[]

An array that has the same length as the args parameter. It represents the invoked member's argument attributes in the metadata.

locale
CultureInfo

Provides information about a specific culture or locale. Used to format numbers, dates, and strings correctly.

namedParameters
String[]

An array of parameters.

Returns
Object

The return value of the call to the member.

Attributes
DebuggerStepThroughAttribute

WrapMembers(MemberInfo, Object)

Creates a wrapped object that contains the specified member together with the specified object.

protected static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] WrapMembers (System.Reflection.MemberInfo member, object obj);
Parameters
member
MemberInfo

The member to wrap.

obj
Object

The object that member is defined on.

Returns
MemberInfo[]

A one-element array that has a wrapped object that contains the member information and obj.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

This method enables other objects that do not contain the member to store it and then return its value as if it were their own.

WrapMembers(MemberInfo[], Object)

Creates an array of wrapped objects that contain the specified members together with the specified object.

protected static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] WrapMembers (System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] members, object obj);
Parameters
members
MemberInfo[]

The members to wrap.

obj
Object

The object that members are defined on.

Returns
MemberInfo[]

An array of wrapped objects, each of which contains member information and a copy of obj.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

This method enables other objects that do not contain these members to store them and then return their values as if they were their own.

WrapMembers(MemberInfo[], Object, SimpleHashtable)

Creates an array of wrapped objects that contain the specified members together with the specified object, caching the results in the specified data storage.

protected static System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] WrapMembers (System.Reflection.MemberInfo[] members, object obj, Microsoft.JScript.SimpleHashtable cache);
Parameters
members
MemberInfo[]

The members to wrap.

obj
Object

The object that members are defined on.

cache
SimpleHashtable

Temporary data storage for the wrapped objects.

Returns
MemberInfo[]

An array of wrapped objects, each of which contains member information and a copy of obj.

Attributes
ComVisibleAttribute

Remarks

This method enables other objects that do not contain these members to store them and then return their values as if they were their own.
